title: Machine Gun Kelly Interview and More
itunes:title: Machine Gun Kelly Interview and More
description:
Thursday 9.20 - Today on the show we had one rapper that has been making a lot of headline lately and that is Machine Gun Kelly, and the first question asked was all about his beef between Eminem and G- Eazy. He also spoke about his drug use and his upcoming EP. Moreover, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a man accused of faking down syndrome so he would be bathed and have his diaper changed in other words a "Man Child". Also Angela helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee". 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
